name: Chheplo
body:
### Welcome
I am a computer scientist, who likes to work on various interesting projects (mostly Python and Node.js), and post them here for everyone to use.

## Projects
### Mathomata
http://chheplo.github.io/MathoMata/

Automatically generate mathematical exercises for kids using Python based GUI with large selection of complexities.
### Python Home-Server utilities
https://github.com/chheplo/Python-HomeServer-Utils


## Python programming for Arduino
Check out my Internet of Things book, **Python programming for Arduino**.

![Python programming for Arduino](https://d255esdrn735hr.cloudfront.net/sites/default/files/imagecache/ppv4_main_book_cover/2798_5938OS_Python%20Programming%20for%20Arduino_cov.jpg)

http://www.amazon.com/Python-Programming-Arduino-Pratik-Desai-ebook/dp/B00U64KQMC/

http://python-programming-arduino.github.io/

### Contact
For any questions please contact me at @chheplo or http://twitter.com/chheplo.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
